Ntc-ansible Modules (multi-vendor)
============


.. toctree:: :maxdepth: 1

  compare_dict - verify that ntc template test case passes <compare_dict_module>
  get_test_info - Pull required info for tests templates automagically <get_test_info_module>
  ntc_config_command - Writes config data to devices that don't have an API <ntc_config_command_module>
  ntc_file_copy - Copy a file to a remote network device over SCP. <ntc_file_copy_module>
  ntc_get_facts - Get facts about a remote network device. <ntc_get_facts_module>
  ntc_install_os - Install an operating system by setting the boot options like boot image and kickstart image. <ntc_install_os_module>
  ntc_reboot - Reboot a network device. <ntc_reboot_module>
  ntc_rollback - Set a checkpoint or rollback to a checkpoint <ntc_rollback_module>
  ntc_save_config - Save the running config locally and/or remotely. <ntc_save_config_module>
  ntc_show_command - Gets config data from devices that don't have an API <ntc_show_command_module>
